text: The following lists events that happened during 1944 in Cape Verde. ==Incumbents== *Colonial governor: João de Figueiredo ==Events== *March - Cape Verdean review Certeza started publishing in PraiaEugene Tavares Littératures lusophones des archipels atlantiques : Açores, Madère, Cap-Vert, São Tomé e Príncipe, (Lusophony Literature in the Atlantic Archipelagoes: Azores, Madeira, Cape Vede and São Tomé and Príncipe, L'Harmattan, 2009, p. 217 ==Births== *22 February: Isaura Gomes, politician and pharmacist *17 May: Luís de Matos Monteiro da Fonseca, politician ==References== Category:1944 in the Portuguese Empire Category:Years of the 20th century in Cape Verde Category:1940s in Cape Verde Cape Verde Cape Verde
title: 1944 in Cape Verde
